name: shincode-dev-skills
description: ShinCode's Claude Code Skills marketplace - Interactive web project setup and development tools

plugins.name: new-webapp
plugins.description: Interactive web project setup. Guides through selecting framework (Next.js/React+Vite), BaaS (Supabase/Turso), auth (better-auth/Clerk), payment (Stripe), storage, and email. Generates complete project scaffold with docs/ for requirements management.

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: Development workflow guide. Manages requirements definition, design document generation (architecture, database, API), task ticket creation, and implementation tracking. Use after project setup to guide the full development lifecycle.

plugins.name: stripe-setup
plugins.description: Stripe payment integration guide. Implements subscription plans (3-tier), one-time payments, Customer Portal, and webhooks for web applications.
